page.title: 07Going to School.
page.content: I like going to school very much,but sometimes I don't when I have forgotten to do my work.I am in the top class now and next year I will go to Fishguard Secondary.Some of my friends will go to Preseli and one will go to Cardigan Secondary. Before Christmas we had to work hard on tables and learning good spelling and neatness and doing lots of exercises from books.Now in the summer we go outside to study lots and write about what we see and what older people tell us. We have a good choir,orchestra with recorders,violins,'cellos and some are learning the trumpet and trombone now. We go swimming once a week at Fishguard.Girls do netball,some hockey and rounders,the boys do rugby,some football and cricket.We have three Houses,Curig,Ingli and Morfa.
